title: [Gameplay] Visual bug - Abyssal Nautilus W (shield) missing texture
body:
**Type of Bug**: In-game visual bug

**Description**: Abyssal Nautilus W (Titan's Wrath) effect has no texture/corrupted texture. This bug has existed since 5.12 (the Nautilus VFX updates).

**Video**

https://youtu.be/2nVTmON6oKw?t=1m23s

**Steps to reproduce**: Pick Nautilus, use W (Titan's Wrath).

**Expected result**: The shield graphics (the window grates) should be coloured correctly.

**Observed result**: The shield graphics have no texture and appear almost completely black.

**Reproduction rate**: 100%. Have also tried repairing and completely reinstalling so am sure it's not a problem with my game files.

replies.body:
Hiya BurnOutBrighter,

Thanks for the well-documented report! We'll look into this and see why this dude's missing his textures.
Is that not how the texture is supposed to look? Are there any images or videos that show what it _is_ supposed to look like?
I can't find a video from his texture update which also uses his shield. However on earlier skin spotlights you can see the shield has the same colour scheme as his skin - black and gold.
